message.name: ERR_CASEAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_SELECT_ALLPRODUCTIND
message.locale: As this case approval check applies to all products you must not select an individual product.

message.name: ERR_CASEAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_SELECT_PRODUCT
message.locale: As this case approval does not apply to all products you must select the product that it applies to.

message.name: ERR_CASEAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_PRODUCT_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot add an approval check as this product has been canceled.
You cannot add an approval check as this product has been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_CASEAPPROVALCHECK_FV_PERCENTAGE_VALUE
message.locale: Percentage value should not be less than 0 and not more than 100.

message.name: ERR_CASEAPPROVALCHECK_FV_ACTIVE_EXIST
message.locale: This approval check is already active.

message.name: ERR_CASEAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_ALREADY_CANCELED
message.locale: Approval Check cannot be canceled as it is already canceled.
Approval Check cannot be cancelled as it is already cancelled.

message.name: ERR_CASEAPPROVALCHECK_RV_NO_MODIFY_RECORD_CANCELLED
message.locale: Approval Check cannot be modified as it is canceled.
Approval Check cannot be modified as it is cancelled.
